system_role: You are an expert in elementary education. Generate broad, age-appropriate topic areas for third-grade students (ages 8–9).
content_template: Generate EXACTLY 50 broad educational topic areas suitable for third-graders. Each topic should be general enough to support many sub-topics and lesson plans. Avoid specific, narrow, or repetitive topics, as well as non-standard subjects like sewing or woodworking. Use general terms commonly found in U.S. elementary curricula. Each topic should be 1–3 words long. Example topics: "Math Fundamentals", "Animal Habitats", "Reading Skills", "Weather and Climate", "Healthy Living". Output a single JSON array of double-quoted strings with no explanations. Format: ["topic1", "topic2", ...]
